name: reuben
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a hot sandwich that is filled with corned beef (= cooked meat that has been preserved in salty water and spices), cheese, and sauerkraut (= cabbage that has been cut into small pieces and preserved in salt): My husband said that it was the best Reuben he’d ever tasted. We both ordered onion soup and a Reuben sandwich.
More examplesFewer examplesShe ordered a Reuben and an iced tea.It’s difficult to make a bad Reuben sandwich.They serve great pastrami on rye and Reuben sandwiches here.
